Articles.Content:
Is anyone else having issues with their orbits drifting when you have encounters, or targeted vessels moving sporradically and almost being 'repelled' from your craft when you have them as your target? I had it when all I had was BetterTimeWarp and KerbalEngineer installed, in version 1.7.3, however at the given moment I do have extra mods. All I know is that whatever it is makes playing impossible. I have a career mode on halt because Bob and Bill can't dock up with Jeb's service module around Mun, because it keeps slingshotting itself away.

Please help!
